javax.servlet.sip

Interface SipApplicationConfiguration


  • public interface SipApplicationConfiguration
    Interface for configuring a SIP application programmatically. .
    Since:
    2.0
    See Also:
    SipApplication, SipServletContext.getSipApplicationConfiguration()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getApplicationName()
      Gets the name of the application.
      boolean getDistributable()
      Returns whether the application is configured as distributable or not.
      String getMainServlet()
      Gets the configured main servlet.
      int getProxyTimeout()
      Gets the proxy time out of the application in seconds.
      int getSessionTimeout()
      Gets the session time out of the application in minutes.
      void setMainServlet(String servletName)
      Sets the main servlet of the application.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationName

        String getApplicationName()
        Gets the name of the application.
        Returns:
        String representing the name of the application.

      • getMainServlet

        String getMainServlet()
        Gets the configured main servlet.
        Returns:
        name of the main servlet of the application.
        See Also:
        SipApplication.mainServlet()

      • setMainServlet

        void setMainServlet(String servletName)
        Sets the main servlet of the application.
        Parameters:
        servletName - Name of the servlet.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - - if the ServletContext from which this SipApplicationConfiguration was obtained has already been initialized.
        See Also:
        SipApplication.mainServlet()

      • getProxyTimeout

        int getProxyTimeout()
        Gets the proxy time out of the application in seconds.
        Returns:
        proxy time out in seconds.
        See Also:
        SipApplication.proxyTimeout()

      • getSessionTimeout

        int getSessionTimeout()
        Gets the session time out of the application in minutes.
        Returns:
        session timeout in minutes.
        See Also:
        SipApplication.sessionTimeout()

      • getDistributable

        boolean getDistributable()
        Returns whether the application is configured as distributable or not.
        Returns:
        True if the application is configured distributable, false otherwise.
